text: Bheemili Assembly constituency is a constituency in Visakhapatnam district of Andhra Pradesh, representing the state legislative assembly of Andhra Pradesh in India. It is one of the seven assembly segments of Visakhapatnam (Lok Sabha constituency) namely Srungavarapukota, Visakhapatnam East, Visakhapatnam South, Visakhapatnam North, Visakhapatnam West and Gajuwaka. Muttamsetti Srinivasarao (Avanthi Srinivas) is the present MLA of the constituency, who won the 2019 Andhra Pradesh Legislative Assembly election from YSR Congress Party. , there a total of 305,958 electors in the constituency. == Mandals == The four mandals that forms the assembly constituency are: {| class="wikitable" !S.No !Mandal Name |- |1 |Bheemili |- |2 |Anandapuram |- |3 |Padmanabham |-
